name: Arac-O-Bama Phobia
description:
Finally, the bird has been killed. But a new infestation has grown in the bedroom and you have to eliminate it, and free the bedroom from these evil monsters once and for all.

Use Ctrl while jumping to squish the spider

btw the bedroom is a mess pls clean it

made for: https://itch.io/jam/fear-jam-3
